result.property: 広域内住所地特例フラグ
広住特措置元市町村コード

select.id: get被保険者台帳と宛名情報

mapper.select:
SELECT 振込明細一時TBL.*, 被保険者台帳."hihokenshaNo" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_hihokenshaNo", 被保険者台帳."idoYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_idoYMD", 被保険者台帳."edaNo" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_edaNo", 被保険者台帳."idoJiyuCode" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_idoJiyuCode", 被保険者台帳."shichosonCode" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_shichosonCode", 被保険者台帳."shikibetsuCode" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikibetsuCode", 被保険者台帳."shikakuShutokuJiyuCode" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuShutokuJiyuCode", 被保険者台帳."shikakuShutokuYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuShutokuYMD", 被保険者台帳."shikakuShutokuTodokedeYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuShutokuTodokedeYMD", 被保険者台帳."ichigoShikakuShutokuYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_ichigoShikakuShutokuYMD", 被保険者台帳."hihokennshaKubunCode" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_hihokennshaKubunCode", 被保険者台帳."shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode", 被保険者台帳."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuSoshitsuYMD", 被保険者台帳."shikakuSoshitsuTodokedeYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuSoshitsuTodokedeYMD", 被保険者台帳."shikakuHenkoJiyuCode" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuHenkoJiyuCode", 被保険者台帳."shikakuHenkoYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuHenkoYMD", 被保険者台帳."shikakuHenkoTodokedeYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuHenkoTodokedeYMD", 被保険者台帳."jushochitokureiTekiyoJiyuCode" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiTekiyoJiyuCode", 被保険者台帳."jushochitokureiTekiyoYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiTekiyoYMD", 被保険者台帳."jushochitokureiTekiyoTodokedeYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiTekiyoTodokedeYMD", 被保険者台帳."jushochitokureiKaijoJiyuCode" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiKaijoJiyuCode", 被保険者台帳."jushochitokureiKaijoYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiKaijoYMD", 被保険者台帳."jushochitokureiKaijoTodokedeYMD" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiKaijoTodokedeYMD", 被保険者台帳."jushochiTokureiFlag" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochiTokureiFlag", 被保険者台帳."koikinaiJushochiTokureiFlag" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_koikinaiJushochiTokureiFlag", 被保険者台帳."koikinaiTokureiSochimotoShichosonCode" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_koikinaiTokureiSochimotoShichosonCode", 被保険者台帳."kyuShichosonCode" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_kyuShichosonCode", 被保険者台帳."logicalDeletedFlag" AS "DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho_logicalDeletedFlag",
FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 振込明細一時TBL INNER JOIN rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaichoAlive" AS 被保険者台帳 ON 振込明細一時TBL."hihokenshaNo" = 被保険者台帳."hihokenshaNo" INNER JOIN
AS ON 被保険者台帳."shikibetsuCode" = ."shikibetsuCode"
